Introduction
This topic contains information on developing claims for SC for radiogenic diseases under 38 CFR 3.309(d), including
centralized processing of claims based on radiation exposure
criteria to consider before beginning development of a claim for SC for a radiogenic disease
action to take
if the criteria for development are not met
, and
when radiation exposure is alleged, but no disability is claimed
source for information on radiation-risk activities
information that must be included in the development letter to DTRA
, and
additional information to include in the development letter to DTRA
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) for Disabilities Resulting from Ionizing Radiation Exposure Under 38 CFR 3.309
